title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. V, pt. 8, ch. 8C, fig. 8C-2 - Example of Location Plan for Flashing-Light Signals and Four-Quadrant Gates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. V, pt. 8, ch. 8C, fig. 8C-2 - Example of Location Plan for Flashing-Light Signals and Four-Quadrant Gates

State Regulations
INSERT note in Figure 8C-2: Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. V, pt. 8, ch. 8C, fig. 8C-2

The center of the flashing-light signal support and the
tip of the automatic gate should both be no further than 15 feet measured
perpendicular to the nearest rail. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
